name: The Penguin IQ Test
description:
Synopsis

The penguin was cruelly taken away from his native land, separated from his family, and locked up inside a dungeon...
Now he is trying to return to the ice floe to find his loved ones again...
However, he is not sufficiently smart to solve the puzzles on his way home ...

Rules

You have to place objects to help the penguin safely walk his way out of the level.
Unfortunately, the penguin only knows how to do one thing: move forward.
Your goal is to place the right objects, at the right spot, to program the penguin's behavior. A solution is always easy to verify, but may be hard to find.
If you make a mistake, the penguin will be stuck forever or die.
Once you think you have a correct configuration, press the button "Try" to see the result.
